subject: Medicine
title: The Milkshake Mindset Study
description: Learn The Milkshake Mindset Study in one minute.

hook.text: Two identical milkshakes produced different hormone levels.

buildup.text: Participants drank the same shake labeled two different ways.

discovery.text: One label said indulgent, the other said sensible and low-fat.

twist.text: The indulgent label caused a steeper drop in hunger hormones.

climax.text: Believing food is rich changed how the body processed it.

quiz.question: What happened when a milkshake was labeled indulgent?
